pageContext.claim: “He [Biden] cannot pass the test I 'aced'. He should give it a try!!!”
pageContext.analysis: In 2018, Trump passed a cognitive test known as the Montreal Cognitive Assessment, which tests for “mild cognitive dysfunction" It's a ten minute test and patients are asked to draw a clock, animals and other objects. Patients can receive up to 30 points. Any score 26 and above is considered normal. Anything lower indicates dementia.Trump scored a 30, but so would most people.
